name: CardVest
description:
A Card Game based on the theme "Harvest".

Plant seeds in 3 plots, give them enough sunlight and water to grow (it's different for each seed- use the yellow-orange part of the bar as a guide) until the green bar at the top reaches its max and you get to harvest it for some sweet, sweet, money! ...Which you can then use to buy more seeds or resources at the end of each day. Keep going until you run out of seeds and money!

Be careful, however, as if you don't grow a plant for 2 days in a row it will die!

You have to use a WEATHER card each turn, which will affect all plants.

The resource cards are optional, however- use them if you need them, but remember, they cost money and you may need to buy more if you run out! You can alternatively press "FINISH DAY" if you're happy with the status of your plants.
